title: SKIN IDEA : Warlord Talon
body:
Howz that!! S... So Why Not Talon Warlord?? Just An Idea...
http://th09.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/f/2015/039/9/7/warlord_talon_by_se7enpeace-d8h5mdg.png
[](http://th09.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/f/2015/039/9/7/warlord_talon_by_se7enpeace-d8h5mdg.png)

replies.body: Cause it would probably go against his lore (if rito cares anymore). Hes an assassin for a small group, not part of any affiliated army.
This is so freaking awesome. Would be an instabuy.

in any case talon is well over due for another skin, I loved the soul reaver skin concept I seen a while ago, but seeing as talon is no longer very popular without his silence he wont get a skin till they address his e problems

Im trowing rp at the screen, nothings happening?

Tutorial Please
That is a good art, I dunno if it fits into the warlord theme though.
No offense but while the skin splash does indeed look epic, what about it is changed other than the color scheme?

> [{quoted}](name=DatEpicPotato,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=E8ncXftM,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-09T11:11:05.627+0000)
>
> No offense but while the skin splash does indeed look epic, what about it is changed other than the color scheme?

a little shine... and its an idea... im not a digital artist.. but i can photoshop...
i cant paint with photoshop.. but i can mix things... so i made this...

no but he joined du couteau.... so he's part of an army or whatever you can say...
i just gave an idea... lol... just rename it.. haha [Templar Assasin..LoL]
